summary: A Seattle detective and a biologist are on the run from a dangerous invisible assassin gone rogue.
cast: Christian Slater|Peter Facinelli|Laura Regan|David McIlwraith|William MacDonald|Sarah Deakins|Jessica Harmon|Sonya Salomaa|Terri Anne Welyki|John Shaw|David Abbott|Hamish Cameron|Colin Lawrence|Zara Taylor|Nolan Gerard Funk|Jamie Bell|Bruce Dawson|Dean Paul Gibson|Dean Redman|Mike Dopud|Alana Husband|Yee Jee Tso|Michael Kopsa|Woody Jeffreys|Chelah Horsdal|Darcy Belsher|Darcy Laurie|Ted Friend|Dagmar Midcap|Stefano Giulianetti|Karen Holness|Jianna Ballard|Mark Ferns|Carolyn Chiodini-Cable|Joshua Kalef
title: El hombre sin sombra 2
